      • checkString

        public static boolean checkString(java.lang.String s,
                                  java.lang.String checksum_s)
        Determines if input checksum is correct for given String
        Parameters:
        s - String to be tested
        checksum_s - 4-hex-digit checksum as a String
        Returns:
        true if checksum_s is correct checksum for s; false otherwise
